requirements.text: Create a backend data model to store AC service bookings with fields for customer name, contact number, service type (installation, repair, maintenance, cleaning), preferred date and time, address, and booking status
acceptanceCriteria: Backend defines a Booking type with all required fields
Service type is restricted to the four specified options
Booking status field is included in the data model

requirements.text: Implement backend functions to create new AC service bookings, retrieve all bookings, update booking status, and delete bookings
acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a function to create a new booking
Backend exposes a function to retrieve all bookings
Backend exposes a function to update the status of an existing booking
Backend exposes a function to delete a booking

requirements.text: Create a booking form interface where users can enter customer details (name, phone), select service type from options (installation, repair, maintenance, cleaning), choose preferred date and time, and provide service address
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes input fields for customer name and phone number
Form includes a dropdown or radio buttons for service type selection with all four options
Form includes date and time picker inputs
Form includes an address input field
Form has a submit button that creates a new booking

requirements.text: Display a list or table view of all AC service bookings showing customer name, service type, scheduled date/time, address, and current status with ability to update status or cancel bookings
acceptanceCriteria: UI displays all bookings in a list or table format
Each booking shows customer name, service type, scheduled date/time, address, and status
UI provides controls to update the status of a booking
UI provides a control to cancel (delete) a booking

requirements.text: Design a professional and clean visual theme suitable for a service booking application with a cohesive color scheme, clear typography, and intuitive layout that works well for form inputs and data displays
acceptanceCriteria: Application uses a consistent color scheme throughout
Typography is clear and readable for all text elements
Layout is intuitive and makes form submission and data viewing straightforward
Visual design is appropriate for a professional service booking context
